divs: sighting detailsi was sitting at my desk and noticed suddenly loud vibrations\humming encompassing my house. i assumed it was a very low flying plane so i looked out my window. i saw in the forestry across my house several very bright laser-like green lights that flashed for a few seconds and disappeared. it was fluttery, green light particles that reminded me of a green laser. i could not believe what i saw and quickly rushed outside where the sound persisted; a very low frequency, humming, vibrations, that sounded like a kind of alien ufo. i did not see anything else after the light. the sound, however, went on for nearly half an hour but varied in intensity and eventually faded away.
Summary: Flashing green laser lights accompanied by intense vibrations/humming
trends: There have been 43 other sightings in Arlington
There was one other sighting in Arlington on or around July 23rd 2011
